query: SELECT chapterNumber, title, SUBSTRING(audioUrl, 1, 80) as audioUrl, audioDuration FROM book_chapters ORDER BY chapterNumber LIMIT 14
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 4S4NaSTm8gULMAn.ab4bddc10a61 --database fsRnWghWhaoD2r3KXXoRti --execute SELECT chapterNumber, title, SUBSTRING(audioUrl, 1, 80) as audioUrl, audioDuration FROM book_chapters ORDER BY chapterNumber LIMIT 14
